com.example.federico.wearableui.intraprocess_messaging

Class IntraProcessMessageHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • Handler
      • com.example.federico.wearableui.intraprocess_messaging.IntraProcessMessageHandler

  • public class IntraProcessMessageHandler
extends Handler
    Class that defines the Handler for the Main Thread. This Handler receives and manages all the Messages that are dispatched towards the Main Thread and reacts to them by calling the appropriate callback of the interface linked to it. These Messages that are received by the Handler, are built around IntraProcessMessages. This class is also a Singleton and can not function until a IPMHCallbackInterface has been set as its callback interface. The interface can be set by calling the init() method.
